Class SchemaBuilder.TypeBuilder<R>

  • java.lang.Object

  • Enclosing class:
    SchemaBuilder

    public static final class SchemaBuilder.TypeBuilder<R>
extends SchemaBuilder.BaseTypeBuilder<R>
    A Builder for creating any Avro schema type.

    • Method Detail

      • unionOf

        public SchemaBuilder.BaseTypeBuilder<SchemaBuilder.UnionAccumulator<R>> unionOf()
        Description copied from class: SchemaBuilder.BaseTypeBuilder
        Build an Avro union schema type. Example usage: 
        unionOf().stringType().and().bytesType().endUnion()
        Overrides:
        unionOf in class SchemaBuilder.BaseTypeBuilder<R>

      • nullable

        public SchemaBuilder.BaseTypeBuilder<R> nullable()
        Description copied from class: SchemaBuilder.BaseTypeBuilder
        A shortcut for building a union of a type and null.

        For example, the code snippets below are equivalent: 

        nullable().booleanType()
        unionOf().booleanType().and().nullType().endUnion()
        Overrides:
        nullable in class SchemaBuilder.BaseTypeBuilder<R>
